title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.27 - Leasing of games of chance equipment from any unlicensed person prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.27 - Leasing of games of chance equipment from any unlicensed person prohibited

State Regulations

No licensed games of chance supplier, its duly authorized
agents, salespersons or representatives, shall rent or lease games of chance
supplies, devices or equipment from any person, firm, partnership, association, joint venture, corporation, or organization unless such person, firm, partnership, association, joint venture, corporation or organization is a
licensed games of chance supplier. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4607.27

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
